metadata.description: Polygon Labs is inviting the web3 community to select and share their favorite use case on twitter, to be able to mint a free NFT. All proceeds from secondary sales will be donated to the DeFi Education Fund, a nonpartisan research and advocacy group working to explain the benefits of decentralized finance (DeFi), achieve regulatory clarity for the future of the global digital economy, and help realize the transformative potential of DeFi for everyone.
metadata.name: Social Impact & Sustainability
